title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 197 w/ Steve Rifkind)
itunes:title: Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER (Recap of Ep. 197 w/ Steve Rifkind)
description:
Drink Champs: THE HANGOVER - In this edition of The Hangover, the squad is back! This week we recap our conversation with the legendary record executive Steve Rifkind!

Check out as Hazardis Soundz, Mr. Lee and Sunny D share some of their favorite moments from this weeks episode!

Follow:
